meanings.definition: The act or process of determining the time at which something occurs.
meanings.sent1: She carefully checked the timings of the buses to plan her trip.
meanings.sent2: The timings of the trains were displayed on the electronic board.
meanings.sent3: His obsession with timings made him the punctuality champion of the office.
meanings.sent4: The timings of nature's rhythms never fail to amaze me.
meanings.sent5: The timings of the sunrise and sunset create a beautiful natural spectacle.

meanings.definition: The arrangement or scheduling of events or activities at specific times.
meanings.sent1: The timings of the meetings were conflicting, causing chaos in the office.
meanings.sent2: The concert timings were perfect for everyone to attend.
meanings.sent3: The timings of the dance rehearsals seemed to be in sync with the music.
meanings.sent4: The timings of the traffic lights dictated the flow of vehicles.
meanings.sent5: The timings of the fireworks show lit up the night sky with bursts of color.
